availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John S. Thomas (Warren County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, farmer. Warren County, Kentucky, native. Son of John Thomas and Elizabeth Hays Thomas. Married to Martha Jane Patillow Thomas. Father of Jesse Thomas, Davis Thomas, Elizabeth Thomas, John Thomas, Andrew Thomas, and Samuel Thomas. Farmer in Warren County in 1850. Farmer in Warren County in 1860. Farmer in Warren County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District No 2, p. 67A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District No 1, p. 813.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, Lucus Precinct, p. 224A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Warren County, KY, February 1864, p. 149.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994057, Warren County Births, p. 8
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994057, Warren County Deaths.
